main event: A civilian observer sighted a bright, silvery, circular or slightly elliptical object in the sky over a construction site in Hawaii.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be approximately 300 feet in diameter and at an elevation of about 3,500 feet.
The object was traveling at a speed of approximately 300 miles per hour in a northerly direction.
The object had an inner brightness of its own and made no sound as it passed over the building.
The observer, a commercial airline pilot, stated that the object was definitely not a conventional aircraft.
The sighting lasted for about 30 seconds before the object disappeared in the distance.
sighted object: a bright, silvery, circular or slightly elliptical object
witnesses: a civilian observer, a commercial airline pilot
